CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1951, pg. 4 reads: "Light Sentence For Slayer - Zacharias Laniear, 20-year-old Braddock musician and ex-GI, is led from a criminal courtroom Wednesday afternoon By Deputy Sheriff Leo Mazick after Judge William H. McNaugher had sentenced him to the workhouse for a term of 11-1/2 to 23 months in fatal shooting of his brother-in-law, Leon Ray, 25, last Dec, 1. Judge McNaugher affixed the degree of the crime at voluntary manslaughter. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Deputy Sheriff Leo Mazick, escorting Zacharias Laniear through corridor of the Allegheny County Courthouse after sentencing
